attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
All petitions on this service are inherently flawed and cannot be trusted. They only allow votes from people in favour of a petition. In a democratic society like ours, we must be allowed to see the opposing vote.

Some would argue that you can create a seperate, opposing petition, but we all know that organisations with deep pockets and marketing clout would be able to skew the result and weblink only to  the petition they favour. It would be so much fairer for every petitioner to choose in favour or against a particular petition. So this petition is to change the petition process. Please sign up if you agree. Unfortunately, if you don't agree you will have no voice here. (not fair is it).

rejection.details: Please direct any feedback to the email address: "team@petitions.pm.gov.uk"
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
